body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary Storrett Hawes on May 5, 1827. Father of Eliza J. Hawes, Elvira Hawes, Nancy Hawes, and John F. Hawes. Farmer in Fleming County in 1850.
